4468.quoteText:
How do we protect your information?

We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your personal information. Among other things, your browser session, as well as the traffic between your applications and the API, are secured with SSL, and your password is hashed using a strong one-way algorithm. You may enable two-factor authentication to further secure access to your account.
4468.title: info given about security practices

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices

8124.quoteText: These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.
8124.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

8361.quoteText: You may enable two-factor authentication to further secure access to your account.</
8361.title: The service provides two factor authentification for your account

tosdr.case: The service provides two factor authentification for your account

8362.quoteText:
We will make a good faith effort to:

  • Retain server logs containing the IP address of all requests to this server, in so far as such logs are kept, no more than 90 days.</
8362.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

8363.quoteText:
Our site, products and services are all directed to people who are at least 16 years old.
If you are under the age of 16, per the requirements of the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) do not use this site.</
8363.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

8365.quoteText: You may irreversibly delete your account at any time.</
8365.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
